author: stsp
msg: (svn_cl__blame): If one of the targets is a non-existent URL or
wc-entry, don't bail out.  Just warn and move on to the next
target. Also return a non-zero error code and print an error message
at the end in those situations.
Patch by: Noorul Islam K M <noorul{_AT_}collab.net>

author: markt
msg: Fix NPEs on shutdown. Loop is prevented above when the child is removed.
